name: Lightabsorber
description:
This game was made in the Brackeys-GameJam!

I had lots of fun making it and look forward to the next one :)

Controlls:

Movement: WASD Keys or Left Joystick if you are using a Controller

Press X or the Shift-Key to turn into a blackhole.

While being a blackhole you can press RB or LeftClick to spawn light.
